# FCI composites (MTG-I)

Predefined wavelength composites for cloud and atmospheric monitoring.

```{python eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
from satpy import Scene
scn = Scene(filenames=files, reader='fci_l1c_nc')
print(scn.available_composite_names())
```

Available composites include:

* 24h_microphysics
* airmass
* ash
* dust
* natural_color
* true_color
* volcanic_emissions

# LI Lightning Imager — Groups

* `group_time`: UTC time
* `latitude`, `longitude`: Radiance-weighted location
* `radiance`: Total radiance
* `number_of_events`
* `flash_id`
* `group_filter_qa`

# LI Lightning Imager — Flashes

* `flash_time`
* `flash_duration`
* `latitude`, `longitude`
* `radiance`
* `number_of_groups`
* `flash_footprint`
* `flash_filter_confidence`

# InfraRed Sounder IRS (MTG-S)

Hyperspectral infrared sounder:

* 4 km spatial resolution
* 60 min full disk coverage
* Retrieves temperature, humidity, ozone, CO

# IRS Spectral Bands

| Band | Range          | Channels |
| ---- | -------------- | -------- |
| LWIR | 679–1210 cm⁻¹  | 887      |
| MWIR | 1600–2250 cm⁻¹ | 1076     |
